001package edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.model.dao;
002
003import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
004import androidx.room.Dao;
005import androidx.room.Insert;
006import androidx.room.Query;
007import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.model.entity.GameResult;
008import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Completable;
009import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
010import java.util.List;
011
012@Dao
013public interface GameResultDao {
014
015  String RANKING_QUERY = "SELECT * "
016      + "FROM game_result "
017      + "WHERE code_length = :codeLength "
018      + "ORDER BY guess_count ASC, duration ASC";
019  String RANKING_QUERY_FOR_USER = "SELECT * "
020      + "FROM game_result "
021      + "WHERE code_length = :codeLength "
022      + "AND user_id = :userId "
023      + "ORDER BY guess_count ASC, duration ASC";
024  String TRUNCATION_QUERY = "DELETE FROM game_result";
025
026  @Insert
027  Single<Long> insert(GameResult gameResult);
028
029  @Query(RANKING_QUERY)
030  LiveData<List<GameResult>> getRankedResults(int codeLength);
031
032  @Query(RANKING_QUERY_FOR_USER)
033  LiveData<List<GameResult>> getRankedResults(int codeLength, long userId);
034
035  @Query(TRUNCATION_QUERY)
036  Completable truncateResults();
037
038  default Single<GameResult> insertAndUpdate(GameResult gameResult) {
039    return insert(gameResult)
040        .map((id) -> {
041          gameResult.setId(id);
042          return gameResult;
043        });
044  }
045}
